QAPair.Question: What is (are) Colon cancer - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on colorectal cancer : American Cancer Society -- www.cancer.org/cancer/colon-rectal-cancer.html , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/cancer/colorectal/ , Colorectal Cancer Alliance -- www.ccalliance.org , National Cancer Institute -- www.cancer.gov/types/colorectal ,
